name: Acorn Pinball
description:
Flip your flippers and bump those bumpers in this Autumn themed pinball game!

Guide your acorn through 6 cozy levels while collectin gfallen leaves to open new levels.

PC Controls:

Left arrow = Launch Acorn / Left Flipper
Right arrow = Launch Acorn / Right Flipper

Mobile Controls

Tapping left side = Launch Acorn / Left Flipper
Tapping right side = Launch Acorn / Right Flipper

This is my entry for the 🍁 Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021 🍄in which I had to make a game in 21 days. Enjoy!
